sentences.en: A vast tract of land is ready for development.
sentences.cn: 一大片广阔的土地可待开发。

sentences.en: Compact discs have brought about a vast improvement in recorded sound quality.
sentences.cn: 激光唱片极大地提高了录音的音质。

sentences.en: I don't see any vast turnarounds in the way we do business.
sentences.cn: 我认为我们的经营方式不会有任何大的改变。

sentences.en: In the past five years, there has been a vast improvement in graduation rates.
sentences.cn: 过去的五年内，毕业率大幅度提高。

sentences.en: Portugal and Spain had possessed vast empires that waxed and waned.
sentences.cn: 葡萄牙和西班牙都曾是经历了兴衰的大帝国。

sentences.en: The dictionary is a vast treasure trove of information.
sentences.cn: 那本词典是个巨大的信息宝库。

sentences.en: The pollution has already turned vast areas into a wasteland.
sentences.cn: 污染已经使大片地区沦为不毛之地。

sentences.en: The refugees come across the border in vast numbers.
The region is valued for its coal and vast electricity-generating capacity.
sentences.cn: 这个地区因其煤炭资源丰富和发电能力巨大而备受重视。

sentences.en: The vast forests of West Africa have shrunk.
sentences.cn: 西非的大片森林面积已缩小了。

sentences.en: The vast majority of our cheeses are made with pasteurised milk.
sentences.cn: 我们生产的绝大部分奶酪都是用巴氏消毒过的牛奶制成的。

sentences.en: The vast majority of the attentive audience applauded these sentiments.
sentences.cn: 大多数聚精会神听讲的观众都对这些观点表示赞赏。

sentences.en: The vast majority of the eggs would be cracked.
sentences.cn: 绝大部分鸡蛋都会被打碎。

sentences.en: There was a vast distance between psychological clues and concrete proof.
sentences.cn: 心理提示和确凿证据之间相差甚远。

sentences.en: This vast archive has been indexed and made accessible to researchers.
sentences.cn: 这个存量巨大的档案室的所有文件都已编了索引，可供研究人员使用。

sentences.en: Vast tracts of the country are wild and undeveloped.
sentences.cn: 乡间大片大片的荒地尚未开发。

sentences.en: We were driven across this wondrous vast land of lakes and forests.
sentences.cn: 我们乘车穿越这片有着湖泊及森林的广袤而神奇的土地。

trans.tran_cn: 广阔的，巨大的，大量的，巨额的
